name: com.unity.recorder
description: The Recorder allows you to capture and save data from the Unity Editor during Play mode: animations, videos, images, audio, AOVs, and more.

_upm.changelog:
### Changed
- Users can now enable alpha capture from the UI in projects that use URP.

samples.description: This example shows how to set up a recording session via script.

Example for integrating a custom command line encoder such as FFmpeg in the Movie Recorder. 
 Requires your own FFmpeg executable. Tested with FFmpeg 5.0.1.
This example shows how to set up a movie recording session via script.
This example shows how to set up a multiple recording session via script.
This example shows how to add "Start Recording" and "Stop Recording" menu items .
